name: Easy Dropbox Integration ‚Äì Browse, Upload, View, Download & Manage Dropbox Files From Your WordPress Website
author: ultradevs

sections.description:
Easy Dropbox Integration ‚Äì Browse, Upload, View, Download & Manage Dropbox Files From Your WordPress Website. This plugin allows you to browse your Dropbox files and upload files to Dropbox from your WordPress website. You can also create a shortcode to show the Dropbox files on your website.

Video Overview

üìö Documentation | üöÄ Get PRO

üÜì Free Features

‚öôÔ∏è Easy Setup
Just login with your Dropbox Account and start managing your Dropbox files from your WordPress website Easily!

‚è´ File Uploader
Upload your files to your Dropbox account from your WordPress website.

üìù Shortcode Builder
Create a shortcode to show your Dropbox files on your WordPress website.

üëÅÔ∏è Previewer
View your files in a preview popup.

üîÄ Contact Form 7 Integration
Add Dropbox file uploader to your contact form 7 form. üé¨ Video

üßë‚Äçüíª Premium Features

üîÄ wooCommerce Downloadable Products Integration
Allow you to select your product’s Downloadable files from Dropbox, Uploading files on checkout coming soon InshAllah. üé¨ Watch Video

ü™Ñ Upcoming Features

üîí User Private Files
Upload your private files to your Dropbox account from your WordPress website.

üîç File Search
Search your Dropbox files from your WordPress website.

üõ†Ô∏è Shortcode Builder Upgrades
We will add File Browser, Links Embedder, Documents Embedder, etc. Soon.

üîó Popular Plugins Integration (Modules)
We have only wooCommerce Downloadable Product’s integration in this plugin. We will be working to add more popular plugins in this plugin soon, InshAllah.

External Libraries and Links Used

We use the following external libraries and links in this plugin
– Dropbox PHP SDK – To browse and upload files from Dropbox
– lightGallery – To show images/videos/pdf and other files in a popup preview
– Flaticon – For Icons.

Links:
https://docs.google.com/viewerng/viewer?embedded=true&url= – To view PDF files in the popup preview.
https://view.officeapps.live.com/op/view.aspx?src= – To view Office files in the popup preview.

Made With Love By ultraDevs ‚ù§Ô∏è

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/easy-dropbox-integration directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.changelog:
